adrFormatAddress: 45 E 85th St, New York, NY 10028-0957, USA

originalText.text: I went to Dr Lotfi for laser treatments on a scar that I have from wrist surgery a few years ago. Right away, I felt comfortable and confident that I was in good hands. He went above and beyond to make sure that I was well-informed about what the process would look like. He also set clear expectations with me about the healing timeline, how many treatments I would need, and what results I could expect after each treatment. He was also available for questions even after I left the office, which was very helpful! I will definitely be back and would highly recommend Dr. Lotfi to anyone looking for an experienced and trustworthy surgeon.

originalText.text: I was so scared to get a rhinoplasty but Dr. Lotfi made me feel like I would get the results I wanted. My nose was hurt through sports and piercings so I desperately wanted to fix it. He was able to schedule me for my surgery exactly when I needed it and the anesthesiologist made the procedure completely pain free. Post op Dr. Lotfi was always available for any questions and would always make sure I was pain free. 10/10 would recommend all of my friends to go to him for rhinoplasty!

originalText.text: Dr. Philip Lotfi has a true understanding of aesthetic. Knowledgeable and highly skillful, there is no one I trust more with my face. From start to finish, he has always been beyond compassionate and patient answering all my questions and detailing his process. I first went to see Dr. Lotfi to correct filler done at/by another office/surgeon and the care he gave I will never forget. I’ve seen him since many times and recommend him to all my friends -each agree, he is simply the best!

originalText.text: Dr. Lotfi did an excellent job in helping correct my deviated septum and helping me breathe more freely from my nose. He is compassionate and listens carefully to his patients. I would highly recommend him to anyone as a skilled and caring surgeon who gives excellent results, both functionally and aesthetically.

originalText.text: I had such a great experience with Dr. Lotfi. It was my first time ever getting Botox, so I definitely wanted treatments that yielded a natural look which is what he absolutely provided. Not only a great bedside manner, he is also extremely honest and transparent when it comes to both treatments and prices so there will be no surprises at the end of the visit. I absolutely trust Dr. Lotfi because unlike other plastic surgeons, he will not push you to get unnecessary treatments nor will he over do it where you will not recognize your self. 10/10 recommend!!
